comprehensive_overview: quickmirseq is a fast and accurate tool for microRNA quantification from small RNA-Seq data. It utilizes an ultra-fast aligner for reads mapping and a novel algorithm for microRNA quantification, offering efficient processing of large datasets.
core_features: 1. Ultra-fast aligner for mapping small RNA-Seq reads. 2. Novel algorithm for accurate microRNA quantification. 3. Efficient processing of large-scale small RNA-Seq datasets. 4. User-friendly interface for ease of use and interpretation of results.
